generated_description: better life design, legally known as better life design inc., is a company based in kumamoto, kumamoto prefecture. the company specializes in the sale, repair, and consultation of hearing aids and related equipment. established in january 1975, better life design aims to enhance the quality of life for individuals with hearing impairments by providing comprehensive support and services, including hearing tests, consultations, and after-sales support. the company operates multiple stores across japan, including locations in fukuoka, okayama, saga, and kumamoto.
